description: This trail is part of the Carmi cross country ski trails area. It can be hiked and mountain biked as well.  For the average skier or mountain bike rider it is a nice trail to get into shape on.  A gradual climb to the top and lots of roller coaster style portions on the downhill.  This trail also intersects the "Code 4" mountiain bike trail for extreme riders which contain tons of ladders, drops and jumps.Bike shop / rentals: Freedom Bike Shop Accomodations: Summerland Resort
directions: Take Carmi Ave off Main Street in Penticton.  Pass the hospital then follow the signs up past the Penticton Race track.  You will pass the race track and head towards the Lost Moose Lodge, an area restaurant, the over the cattle guard on to gravel road.  Take this until you arrive at the ski area parking lot.
title: Peat Bog
